argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | nm1.n | |- N = ( norm ` R ) |
| 2 |  | nm1.u | |- .1. = ( 1r ` R ) |
| 3 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( AbsVal ` R ) = ( AbsVal ` R ) |
| 4 | 1, 3 | #P_nrgabv | |- ( R e. NrmRing -> N e. ( AbsVal ` R ) ) |
| 5 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( 0g ` R ) = ( 0g ` R ) |
| 6 | 2, 5 | #P_nzrnz | |- ( R e. NzRing -> .1. =/= ( 0g ` R ) ) |
| 7 | 3, 2, 5 | #P_abv1z | |- ( ( N e. ( AbsVal ` R ) /\ .1. =/= ( 0g ` R ) ) -> ( N ` .1. ) = 1 ) |
| 8 | 4, 6, 7 | #P_syl2an | |- ( ( R e. NrmRing /\ R e. NzRing ) -> ( N ` .1. ) = 1 ) |
